solution_line_template: After {years} years, growing at the rate of {growth_rate_per_year} inches every year, Haley will have grown by {growth_rate_per_year}*{years} = <<{growth_rate_per_year}*{years}={total_growth}>>{total_growth} inches.

If she is currently {current_height} inches tall, her height after {years} years will be {current_height}+{total_growth} = <<{current_height}+{total_growth}={height_after_years}>>{height_after_years} inches.
